articles.title: Michigan charges 16 Republicans accused of being fake electors for Donald Trump
articles.description: The 16 people are accused of submitting false certificates confirming they were legitimate electors despite Joe Biden’s victory in the state in 2020.
articles.content:
Michigan’s attorney general has filed charges against 16 Republicans accused of being fake electors for Donald Trump after the 2020 election.
US presidents are technically elected by slates of electors in each state.
